report.name: x_SuiviMensuel_G

dataSource.name: Q_REQ_PRINC
dataSource.select: select si.LIBDSG "DPG.libellé", l.codsg "DPG", cli.CLISIGLE "NomMO", cli.CLICODE "Client payeur", a.AIRT "Application", a.ALIBEL "Libellé application", l.icpi "Projet", pi.ilibel "Libellé du projet", l.pid "Ligne Bip", l.pnom "Libellé", l.typproj "Type", l.codcamo "CA payeur", c.CUSAG "ConsAA", b.REESTIME "RéestAA", b.BNMONT "NotAA", b.BPMONTME "PropAA Fourn", '' "Cout", '' "Cout12", b.BPMONTMO "PropAA Client" from ligne_bip l, struct_info si, proj_info pi, application a, consomme c, budget b, client_mo cli where l.codsg = si.codsg(+) and l.icpi = pi.ICPI(+) and l.airt = a.AIRT(+) and l.pid = c.pid(+) and c.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE and l.pid = b.pid(+) and b.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE and l.clicode = cli.clicode and ( l.adatestatut is null or to_number(to_char(l.adatestatut,'YYYY')) >= :P_ANNEE ) and l.typproj not in (7,9) &P_WHERE order by l.pid

function.name: afterpform
proposÉfournaa1formula
anneeformula
date_extractformula
perimetreformula
